articles.title: Fountain Hills launches 24/7 AI assistant to improve access to services
articles.summary: The Town of Fountain Hills has launched a new AI-powered web chat assistant called Misty. Misty is available 24/7 on the town's website to help residents obtain fast answers, submit service requests, and connect with the appropriate department. Fountain Hills is the first municipality in Arizona to implement Citibot's AI- powered resident engagement platform.
